page.title: 10Playground Games
page.content: Girls like to play with "My Little Pony" toys.They have different names, lke Apple Jack and Cotton Candy according to the patterns on them.At Bentley School children make dens round the tree roots and the boys make roadways round them for their toy cars. Other popular games are Hopscotch,marbles and conkers in season.Boys also play Football. One of the popular games at Capel School is 40-40.Somebody is "it" and the others hide.The first person caught is "it" next time.You can "save yourself"by getting to the base without being caught.
